Text: Awesome quality for an awesome finale.

I actually stopped watching during season 8 but the finale was definitely worth watching nevertheless :D

thanks for the fast upload eztv - good quality as always!

Why would you stop watching during season 8 and then just watch the series finale? That's stupid. Even if your excuse is "Steve Carell left the show" it's still a lame excuse. A true fan sticks with it all the way through.

Yeah it takes a true genius to watch every episode of a show and share their thoughtless, inconsequential opinions of other people's preferences.

Thanks, EZTV, for providing this service.
Thank you very much, EZTV. Btw, are you going to upload the upcoming season of Arrested Development? Thanks again.

I cant believe i just watched the last episode, truly it was an awesome and inspiring show and shows like this are very rare to find, and happen only once in a century i hope i will get the chance to watch this again in the future, best tv show!!
